name: Roots of Asgard
description:
The evil Norse gods have assembled to bring about Ragnarok, the end of the world! They have struck out against Yggdrasill, the World Tree, by severing its roots which grow through all the realms of Asgard. You must venture to the various homes of the evil gods and defeat them, in order to collect the severed roots and restore Yggdrasill to full health. Fear not! The World Tree has given you some of its own power to aid you in your quest.

Roots of Asgard is a 3rd-person action-adventure game. In our demo level, the player can walk, run, and jump around a 3D terrain. Be wary! Various enemies wander the landscape, which can be disposed of with a swing of an axe or the player's special "root" ranged ability.

This is a Windows-only game. You'll have to download it from here or from the itch.io client.
